programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A naval commander's body is washed ashore along with the bullet-riddled corpses of two drug traffickers, suggesting he was involved in illicit activities. Gibbs refuses to believe the worst and tries to prove the man's innocence by finding whoever else was involved in the shoot-out. Guest starring Emilie de Ravin (Lost).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates a role-playing game believed to have caused the death of a sailor who was found at the bottom of the sea in his dress whites. Discovering the dead man was a compulsive player, Gibbs and the crew try to find out how far he would have gone to exact revenge on his arch-enemy, another seaman. Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Part two of two. Dr Sloan discovers the identity of the laughing-gas killer and sets a trap for him, while Jack mounts a sting operation to recover Amanda's stolen money. Detective drama, starring Dick Van Dyke.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A former lawman comes out of retirement to fill in for Matt after he is wounded in a gunfight.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: When Joe's horse breaks a leg, he finds himself stranded alone in the desert. He is discovered by an Indian who takes off with his gun, but when the grandfather of the youth finds out what he has done, he orders him to go back to the desert and retrieve Joe.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Megan worries Horatio could be getting too emotionally involved in the hunt for the criminal responsible for his mentor's death in an explosion, and the team is shocked to discover the intended targets of the bombing. Crime drama, starring David Caruso, Kim Delaney, Khandi Alexander and Emily Procter.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen and Sam meet up with former colleague Mike Renko, who is back in town on the trail of a civilian militia he thinks is responsible for the theft of anti-tank missiles from a Navy base. Their discussion is interrupted by Hetty with footage of a man being strangled at an aquarium - and the victim is identified as a lance corporal who was Renko's inside man at the group.(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: First episode of the cult spy series, starring Steven Hill. Dan Briggs brings the IMF team together to recover a pair of nuclear warheads which are being hidden in a hotel vault in Santa Costa.(n)

programme.title: JAG
programme.desc: Mac and Harm fly to Afghanistan to investigate an aborted Navy Seal operation that has led to several casualties, and point the finger of blame at a TV news reporter accompanying the squad. Meanwhile, Lt Roberts sets off for a six-month deployment aboard the USS Seahawk, leaving Harriet and AJ behind.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The bodies of two dishonourably discharged officers are found on board a boat belonging to Gibbs, and inquiries cast suspicion on his mentor, retired agent Mike Franks. The case proves to have wider implications - and the team finds itself battling to prevent an international confrontation. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Dr Sloan's insufferable sister discovers a dead estate estate agent in her new house - and the medical sleuth's investigation throws up no shortage of suspects. Dick Van Dyke stars.(n)

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: An eight-year-old crime proves a challenge for Walker and Trivette when a decomposed body of a young Indian boy is unearthed on a building site. Adventure with the modern-day lawman whose crime-solving methods are rooted firmly in the Old West.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate the murder of an engineer working on highly sensitive submarine technology, but find the crime scene clean of evidence. Forensic scientist Abby Sciuto travels from the NCIS office in Washington, DC to help out as the case has similarities to a serial killer she has been tracking. Guest starring Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A shark caught off the Miami coast is found to contain a human torso bearing a bullet wound. A tattoo leads the team to suspect the victim was a political refugee from Cuba - and the discovery of a second victim, fatally shot in the thigh, confirms the theory. David Caruso stars.(n)

programme.desc: The IMF team take on the task of undermining communist warmonger Janos Karq, and are sent to work with memory expert Joseph Baresh. However, things don't go according to plan.(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 527. In the Season 5 finale, a college student pitches her idea for a flat-folding, reusable storage box; an Indiana couple hope to score a deal for their reinvented cookware; two Beverly Hills moms have an app for measuring foot sizes; and a pair from Illinois present their simple solution for tying a water balloon. Also: catching up with entrepreneurs who have experienced success since coming on the show(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 616. A man from Davenport, Fla., seeks an investment in his grass delivery service for pet owners. Also: a device to eliminate clogged sinks; a worry-free way to share lip balm without sharing germs; a climate-control system for beds; and an update on Barbara Corcoran's investment in Tom+Chee from Season 4(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 701. Season 7 begins with Ashton Kutcher appearing as a "guest shark." Products being pitched include a device to make feeding a baby easier; a new high-tech form of wearable transportation; old-fashioned drinking vinegars; and a solution to crowd-hack-attacks on credit and debit cards. Also: The founders of Pipcorn and Scratch and Grain offer updates on their companies(n)

programme.title: The Deed: Chicago
programme.desc: The Mistake On The Lake. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 514. A woman tries to sell the Sharks on her special mud mask from Alaska. Also: a power strip that blends in with hardwood floors; a company specializing in balloon entertainment; and an update on the founders of Tom and Chee, who successfully pitched their franchise idea to Mark and Barbara during Season 4(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 613. A Brooklyn man tries to spark interest in his family-run business of foldable, wheeled luggage; a Houston woman has a line of soaps and grooming products to pitch; a couple from Sapulpa, Okla., show off their gameday apparel for women; and a Scarsdale, N.Y., entrepreneur gives the Sharks a taste of his single-serve wine that comes in recyclable plastic. Also: Lori Greiner offers an update on her "All-Stars."(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 420. The Sharks get a taste of sugar-free nut butters; and learn about a stylish wristband that promises relief from nausea. Also: a device for removing tattoos; shoes with interchangeable heels; and an update on surf-inspired fitness equipment invested in by Mark(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 720. A Las Vegas woman pitches a product that can help relieve back pain; a brother and sister who call themselves the "Ice Siblings" talk about a cool way to reduce muscle inflammation; a mechanical engineer from Emeryville, Cal., demonstrates his high-tech bike lock; and the Sharks are served gourmet tea shots. Also: an update on a Philadelphia duo's all-natural deodorant invested in by Barbara during Season 7(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 625. A scientist from Tampa encourages the Sharks to invest in his synthetic human cadaver; friends from Seattle look for positive feedback for their personalized superhero action figures; and three women from Philadelphia pitch their affordable online service for high-end interior room design. Also: a device for applying sunscreen; and an update on the Squatty Potty(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 311. Pitches include a flavored mix-and-match lip-balm kissing enhancer, a line of kitchen products, a heat-recycling device and a clothing item that the guy pitching it says is "revolutionary." He calls Apple cofounder Steve Wozniak for advice. Also: a follow-up on a South Carolina woman's Season 2 homemade Daisy Cakes(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug and Carrie decide to try for a baby - but with Arthur under their feet, finding time alone proves difficult. The delivery driver keeps the old man occupied by hiring a dog walker to listen to his stories about the Second World War. Comedy, starring Kevin James.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug treats Carrie to laser eye surgery for her birthday - but the side effects leave her blind for a week, and she's not happy to learn her husband chose the cheapest doctor he could find.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug's colleagues resent his achievement in breaking the record for perfect deliveries, while Carrie wonders why the dog walker enjoys spending time with her father. Comedy, starring Kevin James.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert contemplates leaving the police force to take up a job selling security systems, but the proposal receives a mixed reaction, leading to tense celebrations at his birthday party. Comedy, starring Ray Romano, Brad Garrett and Patricia Heaton.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is delighted to be awarded an honorary doctorate, but hurts Debra's feelings by thanking everyone except her in his acceptance speech. He claims it was an accident, though she takes the opportunity to remind him of past snubs that were obviously deliberate.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: You Can't Tell a Crook by His Cover.
programme.desc: Daphne goes on a date with an ex-convict, but fortunately the Crane brothers are close at hand to protect her honour. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Show Where Lilith Comes Back.
programme.desc: A convention brings Frasier's ex-wife Lilith to Seattle, but he discovers there is a hidden agenda behind her visit. Comedy, guest starring Bebe Neuwirth.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Greg Miller, CEO of the Larry H Miller Group of Companies and co-owner of National Basketball Association team the Utah Jazz, goes undercover. Since his dad died he has made many changes to the organisation, and posing as a contestant on a reality TV competition to win a dream job, he works among his own staff to see if his father's legacy still lives on.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to West Nyack, New York, to come to the aid of a family-run Mexican restaurant that is suffering a financial crisis, and a case of hard-headed patriarchy. When the chef arrives he finds himself turfing out the existing customers for their own safety due to a cockroach infestation on the premises.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Vet on the Hill
programme.desc: Scott Miller treats an elderly cat with a worrying lump in its abdomen, while an overweight dog is limping badly and needs an operation to save its damaged knee.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: Boss James Constantinou and the team appraise more items brought along by members of the public. A divorcee from Newcastle wants to sell her £185,000 necklace to pay for her children's private-school fees, a crystal-covered drum kit used on a Kylie Minogue tour catches the eye of staff member Patrick, and a widowed pensioner hopes to make a fortune from her precious rings. Plus, a valuation doesn't come easy to the experts when a client turns up with a 7ft Terminator model.(n)

programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, with Nicki Chapman alongside Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: A couple search for a home big enough for them and their eight children in Alicante, and the agency takes on a huge property that includes a luxurious cat hotel in the basement.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from the north east of England compete for the £1,000 prize - first up are loved-up musicians Nick and Kelly, followed by Matthew and Katie, and Michael and Becky.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer accidentally saves Mayor Quimby from a rioting mob and is appointed his official bodyguard, but finds himself up against local gangster Fat Tony. Featuring the guest voice of Mark Hamill (Star Wars).(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Darcy persuades Adam to take her to a posh restaurant as a thank you for helping at the salon. Liam teams up with Kim, and Myra continues to manipulate Sally. Meanwhile, Grace bumps into Maxine at the hospital and notes how upset she is about Minnie.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer catches up with two couples who struggled to find their first marital home, including Rupreet and Sundeep who had their hearts set on a specific area in Harrow. Phil also revisits Paul and Elly, who searched for a property in Bristol, to see if they found the perfect house.(n)

programme.title: Auction of a Lifetime
programme.sub-title: Marilyn Monroe: Auction of a Lifetime.
programme.desc: Documentary exploring Marilyn Monroe's life story, told through some of her most personal and glamorous possessions, and interviews with those who knew her well. The programme focuses on an auction that took place in November 2016 in Los Angeles, where many of the Hollywood icon's most sought-after belongings were sold.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Trumps: From Immigrant to President
programme.desc: Donald Trump is the 45th President of the United States and commander in chief of America's armed forces, the most powerful position in the world. This documentary goes back to his roots, to reveal the story of his family. It reveals how Trump's penniless German grandfather arrived in America in the 1880s, and ended up running bars and brothels in the gold rush. And how his Scottish mother travelled from the Outer Hebrides to New York and worked as a maid before marrying Donald's tycoon father.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The popular armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, featuring Line of Duty, University Challenge, Rio Ferdinand: Being Mum and Dad, Comic Relief, Broadchurch, One Night with my Ex, All Round to Mrs Brown's and the News.(n)

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Cameras follow the drama at Liverpool Women's Hospital, where Jodie, 19, found out that she was pregnant after she had a fling with Stephen, 22. He's determined to see his parental responsibilities through, including being at her bedside during a long labour. Also featured is 44-year-old Derroll, who met his wife Maria online. She's a mother of four and wants him to experience fatherhood for himself, but it's not without its challenges.(n)

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Mother and daughter Max and Page develop a canny system of conning rich bachelors out of a fortune. Max marries the target, then Page seduces him, allowing for a lucrative divorce settlement. However, the scheme is threatened when Page falls in love, while a former victim tracks Max down hoping to give their marriage another chance. Comedy, starring Sigourney Weaver, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Gene Hackman, Ray Liotta and Jason Lee.(n)

programme.title: Building the Dream
programme.desc: Charlie Luxton comes to the aid of a Birmingham couple who are planning to build a large family home featuring lots of glazing and a deluxe-size kitchen.(n)

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: The property expert transforms a cottage in Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, with dated decor, a bare kitchen and a garden that resembles a jungle.(n)

programme.title: Fifteen to One

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie is invited to a company gathering, where Doug impresses the other lawyers' partners with tales of his fictitious mountaineering exploits. Back at home, Arthur wrecks their bedroom and enlists Deacon's help in repairing the damage before they return.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug decorates the house for Halloween against Arthur's wishes - and then regrets it when the old man has a heart attack. Meanwhile, Deacon wants to buy a comic-book character costume for his son, but is frustrated to find there aren't any black superheroes. Comedy, starring Kevin James.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Amy's parents draw attention to Robert's strange eating habits, making him feel self-conscious every time he sits down for a meal - so Debra devises a plan to cure him once and for all. Ray Romano, Patricia Heaton and Brad Garrett star.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: An invitation to spend Easter with the Barones spurs the MacDougalls to unite with the family over a 500-piece jigsaw puzzle - until Ray and Pat upset the apple cart by indulging in more than their fair share of bonding. Comedy, starring Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne offers to cook a romantic dinner to help Niles make amends with Maris after an argument - but ends up stranded with him on a stormy night. Comedy, starring David Hyde Pierce and Jane Leeves.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The shrink goes all out to win when he and Roz are nominated for a radio award, but wishes he hadn't after he discovers he is up against a veteran talk-show host who is retiring. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Former undercover bosses, including the co-owner of a frozen yoghurt company and the chief executive of a sports bar and grill, want to take another look at the everyday workings of their businesses, but fear they will be recognised. They each send an employee in their place to report on how their firms are functioning.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to La Grange, a suburb of Chicago, to help the owners of Cafe 36, an upmarket bistro threatening to destroy the marriage of its owners due to the scale of their financial losses. The head chef's attitude to quality control is driving customers away, and it is up to Gordon Ramsay to turn the business around.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Vet on the Hill
programme.desc: Scott Miller treats a French bulldog that has a life-threatening condition. A shih-tzu faces a huge battle and a beagle is having problems.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: Prestige Pawnbrokers boss James Constantinou mixes business with pleasure as he heads to Spain to meet an entrepreneur friend who's looking to get a £100,000 loan on his luxury 18-metre yacht. A young widow finds it difficult to part with her late husband's vintage car to set up a new life in Croatia, jewellery expert Monika is shocked when she's asked to deal with a golden rat, and the shop staff struggle to put a price on some rare and problematic black coral statues.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, with Nicki Chapman joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: Fifteen to One

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: South African couple Gary and Dawn are seeking a permanent home in Spain, with plenty of outdoor space for a barbecue, while art consultant Amy wants a holiday home in Almeria.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Things do not run smoothly for three Bournemouth couples, as one pair are late with their cooking, talk of butchering causes upset and a pescatarian is accidentally served meat.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer takes Ned Flanders to Las Vegas, where they go on a drunken binge at a casino and wake up with hangovers to find themselves married to sleazy, gold-digging cocktail waitresses. Featuring the guest voices of the Moody Blues.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Kim is trying to keep Grace away from Esther, but Grace is beginning to worry. Elsewhere, Darren's money troubles get worse when his car breaks down, and he panics when Nancy suggests that they should go quad biking for the day as one of their bucket list activities.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Great British Buildings: Restoration of the Year
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud and Anna Keay present buildings in the Early category - those constructed between the 13th and 16th centuries. Those in the running are Hampton Court Palace, the Royal Hospital in Chelsea, a medieval building in Ledbury, and Hardwick Hall in Derbyshire, where the previously derelict stable block and barns have been revitalised for modern use. At the end of the programme, it is revealed which buildings have been chosen to make the final shortlist.(n)

programme.title: Three Wives, One Husband
programme.desc: The documentary focuses on the complications of bereavement in the Rockland community. Melinda and Anazella's husband Jim recently died of cancer. His dying wish was for his brother Abel to marry his two widows and bring up his seven children - but Abel has three wives already, and the prospect of further upheaval is daunting for them. Although Jim's death has united Melinda and Anazella in grief, they must now choose whether to stay together as a family and risk living through the heartache of plural marriage again, or go their own way.(n)

programme.title: Kitchen 999: Emergency Chefs
programme.desc: Chefs are known for being fiery and temperamental. But what happens when they walk out, leaving restaurants in the lurch? These days, desperate owners call the relief agency for an emergency chef, who must master unfamiliar menus, handle inexperienced staff and satisfy demanding owners and customers. Here, cameras follows three such chefs as they descend on a luxury London hotel, a Devon manor house and a busy Midlands pub.(n)

programme.title: Isis and the Battle for Iraq
programme.desc: Dispatches special investigating the other side of the war against the so-called Islamic State, looking into allegations of torture, execution and sectarian cleansing by the Shia militia against their fellow Iraqis. The film reports from outside Mosul, where Sunni refugees fleeing Isis face a new threat - potential imprisonment and torture by the militia. Reporter Ramita Navai goes undercover to meet victims and discovers that some groups are using the opportunity of the war against Isis to settle sectarian and historic scores.(n)

programme.title: Pip Ahoy
programme.desc: As Skipper prepares to exhibit his collection of model boats, Hopper drops in and accidently breaks one.(n)

programme.desc: Ryder charts how the pup joined the Paw Patrol after rescuing Jake from an avalanche.(n)

programme.desc: Toot uses a farmer's plough to clear thick seaweed that is clogging up the harbour, and finds out how the smelly green plant can be really useful.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Matthew Wright and his guests talk about the issues of the day, with viewers calling in to offer their opinions.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: The doctors treat patients with mental health problems, including a woman pregnant with twins who is afraid she is developing depression and is referred to a crisis team. A man with schizophrenia suffers physical side-effects from his medication, a patient struggles to separate fiction from reality, and a mother seeks help for her son, who hurts himself when he cannot control his anger.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: The Gadget Show
programme.desc: Craig Charles puts some state-of-the-art headphones to the test. These wireless units incorporate a voice-controlled smart assistant and a fitness tracker, all for £99. Jon Bentley dials up Chinese smartphone the Huawei Honor 6X to see if it is actually better than its more established rivals - and at a fraction of current prices. Plus, Georgie Barrat gets exclusive access to the New York Toy Fair, to check out latest tech playthings that will hit the shops in a few months' time.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Ash allows his frustrations to get the better of him and seeks solace in alcohol, while Leah remains furious with Zac, who gets an offer of support from Sam.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: The Tanakas reel from the news about their father. A troubled Sonya is comforted by Mark, who claims that his feelings towards her are completely platonic.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team works with Abigail Borin of the Coast Guard Investigative Service after a highly suspicious explosion and fire on board an oil rig kills a US marine corps reservist. Abby detects malware in the platform's computer systems, while Ducky finds traces on the victim's body that lead to a lawyer who works for the oil company. Back in the office, a prankster is bringing some light relief and although the likeliest suspect is Tony, he denies any involvement. Crime drama, guest starring Diane Neal.(n)

programme.title: Abducted: The Carlina White Story
programme.desc: A couple take their three-week-old baby to a hospital for treatment, but she is snatched by a woman desperate for a child. She raises the infant as her own for years, but as the girl grows up, she begins to suspect the truth and resolves to investigate her kidnapping and find her parents. Fact-based drama, starring Keke Palmer and Aunjanue Ellis. Edited for drug use.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: The Tanakas reel from the news about their father. A troubled Sonya is comforted by Mark, who claims that his feelings towards her are completely platonic.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Ash allows his frustrations to get the better of him and seeks solace in alcohol, while Leah remains furious with Zac, who gets an offer of support from Sam.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Ancient Mysteries
programme.sub-title: Revealed - The Truth About the Holy Grail.
programme.desc: Documentary examining the possible whereabouts of the ancient Christian relic, reputed to be the cup that Jesus drank from at the Last Supper and that received His blood at the Crucifixion. In 2014, historian Margarita Torres discovered two Arabic parchments recording the journey of Christ's cup from Jerusalem to Spain in 1055. One parchment states that the cup arrived in Spain with a piece missing. The onyx cup in Leon's San Isidora basilica matches this description. In Leon, Torres finds further evidence that this may be the Holy Grail in a medieval painting of the Supper.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: A pregnant woman suffering from abdominal pain visits the surgery, and worries that her unborn baby has also stopped moving in the last 24 hours. Meanwhile, an epileptic patient is left physically and mentally exhausted after suffering from frequent seizures, and a new mother's check-up suggests she may be suffering from post-natal depression.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Agents chase more than £1,700 in unpaid parking fines in south-east London, but struggle to pinpoint the debtor. Meanwhile, officers in north Wales try to recover the £2,000 owed by a tradesman to a former employer, and in Kent agents chase £8,000 owed by a jewellery shop to two former employees.(n)

programme.title: One Night With My Ex
programme.desc: Another three ex-couples spend a night alone together, featuring young parents Scott and Laura, who ended their relationship after Scott's infidelity left Laura unable to trust him. Plus, couple Chloe and Christian who broke up at university try to make amends, and Sophie and Luke spend the night together after two years apart.(n)

programme.title: Gypsy Kids: Our Secret World
programme.desc: The first in a three-part documentary series exploring childhood in Gypsy and traveller communities, beginning with an introduction to 12-year-old Oliver, who has already learned to drive, but believes his true vocation in life lies with horses. Also featured are 13-year-old aspiring model Sylvanna, who must decide whether to take a lucrative contract or preserve her identity, and eight-year-old Margaret, who might jeopardise a sparkling academic career should she choose to follow her sister's example and leave school at the age of 11.(n)

programme.title: All New Traffic Cops
programme.sub-title: All New Traffic Cops: Under Attack.
programme.desc: A high-speed chase in Bradford's crowded streets ends very suddenly and the driver claims he just wants to get home to eat his takeaway while it is still hot. But is that the whole story? In Harrogate, a volatile drink-driver's rapid mood swings prove a test for the cops, while a large stash of cannabis is found at the scene of a major collision, which has left one person with life-threatening injuries. A couple suspected of dealing drugs are chased down and taken to the station, where they provide the traffic team with contrasting reactions to being held in custody. Jamie Theakston presents.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A programmer working for a defence contractor's cyberwarfare department falls to his death from an apartment building. Goren and Eames discover he was a hacker secretly employed by a rival company under a false identity, and a woman claiming to be a friend of the victim says they were actually on a mission to destroy both businesses. Guest starring Michael Kelly (House of Cards) and Jeri Ryan (Body of Proof).(n)

programme.title: Britain's Greatest Bridges
programme.desc: For 17 years from 1981 to 1998, the Humber Bridge was the longest single-span suspension bridge in the world, and many consider it to be Britain's most beautiful. Rob Bell discovers the facts about its groundbreaking construction, why it took so long to build and how it changed the lives of the people of Hull and North Lincolnshire. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Property expert Ann Maurice offers advice to the owner of a four-bedroom Victorian villa in Garelochhead, Argyll and Bute. The house has been on the market for two months, and Ann thinks she knows why - it is far too cluttered with useless knick-knacks that are stopping the natural light from getting in.(n)

programme.title: HouseBusters
programme.desc: Janet Ellis and the team suggest ways in which changes to homes could positively affect the personal lives of their owners.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: A hedgehog needs treatment after being chased down a drain and a pigeon is brought in with a fishing hook stuck in its throat. Plus, an update on CT the badger.(n)

programme.title: Pip Ahoy
programme.desc: Pip and Alba search for the owner of a mysterious feather, leading them to a flamingo that has been blown off course while en route to a concert.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: Lily realises that Salty has something is on his mind and tries to find out what is wrong.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The heroine decides she wants to stop autumn from happening. Julian Clary narrates.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder and the Paw Patrol team rescue Alex when he speeds away on his new trike.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop keeps bothering Bob for a lot of unimportant reasons, so when a real crisis occurs, he finds himself ignored.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Celebrations to mark the Wholefish Cafe's millionth customer do not go to plan.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: James tries to scare Percy and Stephen - but shocks them so much that they fall into the moat.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The inquisitive puppet strikes a pose for budding artists.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Zac wishes for a pet ziffilon for Kaz, but the lovable blue bird is a lot, lot bigger than either of them expected.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Missing Music Player.
programme.desc: The little wooden boy wonders who has taken his music player, which he needs to accompany tonight's dance party.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Wally the walrus gets tangled underwater in an old fishing net, so Ryder deploys Zuma to take him an oxygen tank and the team works out how best to get him safely to the surface.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly forgets Ben's birthday and rushes home to make him a card.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Grumpy is carrying a mysterious box up to the highest hill in Applecross. Digby and Chips do their very best to help. (S1, ep 20).(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig has a nice new picture of Peppa and George. Daddy Pig offers to put it up, but the job is not as simple as he thought.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George and Peppa go to the beach and bury Daddy Pig in the sand.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Hattie the hippo seeks the little girl's help as the leaves she would like are too high for her to reach. Wissper asks treeclimbing Panda Dan to help, but the solution comes from a different and unlikely source.(n)

programme.title: Toot the Tiny Tugboat
programme.desc: Hattie inspires Toot to go on land using Ken Toyn's wheels, but after an exhilarating drive around the Harbour, Toot cannot wait to get off dry land and back into the water.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: The day's news comes under scrutiny from Matthew Wright and the panel, with viewers and the studio audience invited to share their opinions.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: A baby with an exceedingly uncommon variant of Chromosome 3p-syndrome, an already-rare genetic condition, undergoes an operation to correct a heart defect. However, the procedure could mean a delay to his christening. Meanwhile, Joseph, a young bladder cancer patient, hopes Dr Mio Kwan will sign him off work following an operation to remove the offending cells. Plus, Susan worries a stroke may be behind her unusual headaches and facial numbness, but Dr Manj Tawana has another diagnosis in mind - Horner's Syndrome - which is caused by nerve damage to the area of the neck.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: Women who claim benefits while looking after several children. They include Chesterfield mum Maria, who has five kids to five different dads and has not worked since 2002. She is so desperate to get off benefits she has signed herself up to the same college course as her daughter. Birmingham woman Karen has six children and a seventh on the way with partner Ashleigh - and although his job search is not going well he keeps himself busy in other ways. In Weymouth, Kate picks up almost £30,000 a year in benefits to supplement her husband Ian's income as a taxi driver - and spends more than £170 a month of this on pocket money for her seven kids.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Justin enlists Raffy and Ellie to clean Phoebe's house, while Olivia reopens the diner with assistance from Matt, Evelyn and Scott, but finds herself torn when Hunter helps out.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Leo rejects an approach by Kim, still angry at her for keeping their father a secret. Paige feels the heat regarding whether she can cope in the wake of Lauren's departure.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A deep-sea diver is murdered on the job, and his co-workers all become suspects. However, when they return to the surface, they must remain in a high-tech decompression chamber for four days. With each of their suspects confined within a tank, the NCIS team must complete an unorthodox investigation from the outside. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Bond of Silence
programme.desc: A woman searches for answers after her husband is mysteriously murdered while trying to subdue a wild teenage house party on New Year's Eve. However, as she tries to find out the truth, she faces secrecy at every turn from the party-goers and their parents. Drama, starring Kim Raver, Greg Grunberg and Charlie McDermott.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Leo rejects an approach by Kim, still angry at her for keeping their father a secret. Paige feels the heat regarding whether she can cope in the wake of Lauren's departure.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Justin enlists Raffy and Ellie to clean Phoebe's house, while Olivia reopens the diner with assistance from Matt, Evelyn and Scott, but finds herself torn when Hunter helps out.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Documentary highlighting alarming tales from all sides of the buy-to-let system, drawing attention to stories of unruly tenants who refuse to pay their dues and rogue landlords who have failed to live up to their responsibilities. The series also turns the spotlight on dishonest letting agents who have taken advantage of their position of trust to profit at the expense of both property owners and their tenants.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: The stories of four people who have spent a total of almost 90 years on benefits. They include Greater Manchester couple Irene and Steve, who between them have been claiming for 70 years. Irene suffers with agoraphobia, and until recently husband Steve received a care allowance to look after her, but after a recent assessment their money has been cut by £6,000. Plus, a 49-year-old woman who once worked in the benefits office, only for her arthritis to leave her relying on the system, and a 57-year-old Navy veteran who suffers post-traumatic stress disorder after his experiences in the Gulf War.(n)

programme.title: Rich House, Poor House
programme.desc: Families from opposite ends of the wealth and class divide swap homes, budgets and social status for seven days to discover how the other half lives. The Bentleys from Lincolnshire trade places with the Carter-Begbie family from Stamford. The Bentleys rank in the top 10 per cent of Britain's wealthy, and live in a large four-bedroom house with three bathrooms, two reception rooms, a top-of-the-range kitchen, conservatory and games room. The Carter-Begbies live in a rented three-bedroom house and have a weekly budget of £140. This week, however, that will rise to almost £1,800.(n)

programme.title: Shannon Matthews: The Mother's Story
programme.desc: The disappearance of nine-year-old Shannon Matthews in 2008 gripped the nation. Her mother Karen claimed that her daughter had gone missing on her way home from school, prompting a nationwide search. But weeks later, it was revealed that Karen had known the truth all along - Shannon was being kept hidden by a man known to her mother, who had plotted to claim the £50,000 reward money for her return. This documentary tries to get at the truth of a woman many have branded as evil, asking what drove her to do it, how she can rebuild her life and whether she is sorry for her actions.(n)

programme.title: When Kids Kill
programme.desc: Leah Green presents this documentary investigating the case of 18-year-old Lewis Daynes, who exploited schoolboy Breck Bednar's career aspirations in order to groom him online before killing him. Leah speaks to Breck's mother, who is determined to improve other children's awareness of online dangers.(n)

programme.title: Dave Chappelle's Block Party
programme.desc: In September 2004, comedian Dave Chappelle took a break from his immensely successful Comedy Central show to stage a free, unpublicized, all-star hip-hop concert in the Clinton Hill neighborhood of Brooklyn, NY. Inviting fans over the Internet, on the street, and even in his family's hometown of Yellow Springs, OH, Chappelle asked filmmaker Michel Gondry to document the event from its inception on through to the performances themselves. The result is Dave Chappelle's Block Party, a concert film that provides not only a sampling of the music on display that September, but also an intimate look at the comedian himself. Gondry's cameras tag along with Chappelle as he visits Ohio, recruits a university marching band to play at the show, and surveys the opinions of Clinton Hill on the show that's about to take place. Along the way, we're introduced to some the comedian's favorite acts, in rehearsals and on-stage: Dead Prez, Jill Scott, Mos Def, the Roots, Erykah Badu, Kanye West, and the surprise reuniting of the Fugees(n)

programme.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: When a plane crash lands in the middle of nowhere, one of the passengers claims he can build a new craft out of the wreckage(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: In this moving coming-of-age tale, a nerdy teen falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his pals to go on a road trip to find her(n)

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: A working-class laundress in 19th-century London becomes radicalised when she meets a brave cadre of women who are fighting for the right to vote(n)

programme.title: The Soloist
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx stars as Nathaniel Ayers, a former violin prodigy whose bouts with schizophrenia landed him on the streets after two years of schooling at Juilliard. Steve Lopez is a disenchanted journalist dealing with a recent divorce. Steve is wandering through Los Angeles' Skid Row when he spots Ayers. The more Steve learns about Ayers, the more he longs to help the troubled soul(n)

programme.title: Freeheld
programme.desc: Docudrama about terminally ill New Jersey police officer Laurel Hester, whose 2005 legal battle for the right to pass her pension benefits on to her female life partner became an equal-rights milestone(n)

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: Seafaring adventure as, during the Napoleonic wars, a British frigate is sent to track and engage a larger French warship, the Acheron, off the coast of South America. The intense and duty-driven captain of the British vessel must try to coax his war-weary crew to victory, amid a series of explosive naval battle scenes. Based on the novels by Patrick O'Brian(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: After a disastrous summer, Harry returns to begin his fifth year at Hogwarts, one of the toughest he will ever have. A few group of students and parents believe him or Dumbledore that Voldemort is really back, and a never-ending series of articles states that they are insane. On top of that, Dolores Umbridge, the new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher, proves to be the nastiest person Harry has ever encountered(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: A meek young woman emigrates from Ireland to New York City in the 1950s, and finds her heart torn between a magnetic Italian suitor and a charming lad back home(n)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster in this uproarious comedy(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: In this harrowing historical drama set in the winter of 1820, the crew of the New England whaling ship the Essex struggle to survive after an attack by a rogue sperm whale leaves them stranded at sea for 90 days(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: Max Payne is a widowed cop hell-bent on delivering justice no matter what the cost as he investigates a string of killings in his city(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: Wesley Gibson, un hombre apocado, descubre que su padre, a quien nunca conoció y que fue recientemente asesinado, pertenecía a una sociedad secreta de asesinos. Después de que una atractiva mujer vestida de cuero lo recluta y lo hace miembro de la socieda(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: The first major battle of the Vietnam War in 1965, and the soldiers who were involved, are depicted in this drama(n)

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear and Rebecca Romijn-Stamos star in this chiller about a couple who agree to have their dead child cloned by a mysterious scientist (Robert De Niro). But years later, they're unprepared for the new child's extremely disturbing behavior. Cameron Bright, Merwin Mondesir, Sava Drayton(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Three giants of the cinema, Marlon Brando, Robert De Niro and Edward Norton star in Frank Oz's caper thriller. Brando is the crime boss who pressurises ageing thief De Niro into one last big job with 'inside man' Norton as his accomplice but as the cocky Norton starts compromising the job, De Niro becomes more worried about the chance of success(n)

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: An A-list actor and his posse of best buds navigate the perils and pleasures of Hollywood life(n)

programme.title: Stuck on You
programme.desc: Laugh-out-loud comedy about conjoined twins with different dreams(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Drama looking at how whistleblower Dr Jeffrey Wigand and a producer on the American current affairs show 60 Minutes took on the US tobacco industry in a bid to expose the addictive nature of nicotine. Focusing on the human interest story of a family man under terrifying pressures, the factually based action also vividly brings home the David and Goliath story of a battle that made US legal history(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Produced by Tom Hanks, written by Aaron Sorkin, and directed by Mike Nichols, this adaptation of George Crile III's incendiary bestseller tells the remarkable story of the Texas congressman whose efforts to prevent the Red Army from overtaking Afghanistan eventually led to the collapse of the Soviet Union while simultaneously fueling the rise of radical Islam. In the early 1980s, a hastily assembled army of Afghan "freedom fighters" achieved the remarkable feat of fending off Soviet invaders despite the fact that the odds were overwhelmingly stacked against them. At the time, Texas congressman Charlie Wilson (Hanks) was a key member of the hugely powerful House Appropriations Committee. Illuminated to the specifics of this remarkable war by a high-profile Houston socialite, Wilson spearheaded an effort to provide hundreds of millions of dollars in weapons and training to the Mujahideen with more than a little help from brilliant but prickly CIA operative Gust Avrokotos(n)

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A brilliant quadriplegic detective forensics expert tracks a serial killer using computer technology, enlisting help from a gifted, but inexperienced rookie(n)

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: A desperate mother seeks the help of a pair of priests, when her angelic daughter becomes possessed by a terrible demon. Horror(n)

programme.title: The Order
programme.desc: Heath Ledger stars as a renegade Catholic priest who uncovers a dark secret in the Church while investigating the death of his mentor in this spine-tingling religious thriller. The script was written by director Brian Helgeland, who penned the Oscar-winning "L.A. Confidential." He also worked with Ledger and costars Shannyn Sossamon and Mark Addy in "A Knight's Tale." Benno Furmann, Peter Weller, Francesco Carnelutti(n)

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Harry Callahan or Dirty Harry is investigating a strange betting game. A list of local celebrities has been handed out, and bets are being taken on who will be the first to die(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Dave Chappelle's Block Party

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Drama looking at how whistleblower Dr Jeffrey Wigand and a producer on the American current affairs show 60 Minutes took on the US tobacco industry in a bid to expose the addictive nature of nicotine. Focusing on the human interest story of a family man under terrifying pressures, the factually based action also vividly brings home the David and Goliath story of a battle that made US legal history(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Produced by Tom Hanks, written by Aaron Sorkin, and directed by Mike Nichols, this adaptation of George Crile III's incendiary bestseller tells the remarkable story of the Texas congressman whose efforts to prevent the Red Army from overtaking Afghanistan eventually led to the collapse of the Soviet Union while simultaneously fueling the rise of radical Islam. In the early 1980s, a hastily assembled army of Afghan "freedom fighters" achieved the remarkable feat of fending off Soviet invaders despite the fact that the odds were overwhelmingly stacked against them. At the time, Texas congressman Charlie Wilson (Hanks) was a key member of the hugely powerful House Appropriations Committee. Illuminated to the specifics of this remarkable war by a high-profile Houston socialite, Wilson spearheaded an effort to provide hundreds of millions of dollars in weapons and training to the Mujahideen with more than a little help from brilliant but prickly CIA operative Gust Avrokotos(n)

programme.title: Futurama
programme.desc: The Cryonic Woman. When Fry and Bender decide to take the Planet Express ship out for a joy ride and end up damaging the building, they get themselves and Leela fired. Leela decides to get her old job back at the Cryogenics lab, but accidentally switches her old career chip with Fry's. She ends up working as a pizza delivery girl while Fry and Bender have new jobs as cryogenics counselors. Fry and Bender are enjoying their new jobs when Fry unfreezes his old girlfriend Michelle from a thousand years ago. It turns out Michelle's life went downhill after Fry left and she froze herself to get a new start(n)

programme.desc: Starvin' Marvin. The boys donate money to support an Ethiopian so they can receive a free sports watch. Instead of the watch, though, they receive an Ethiopian boy, whom they name Starvin' Marvin. Marvin begins to feel at home in South Park, so when the authorities come to retrieve him, he sends Cartman instead. A lost little American boy in Ethiopia, Cartman struggles to survive before finding Sally Struthers' horde of snacky cakes. programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: Evil Up Close
programme.sub-title: The Playing Card Killer: Alfredo Galan
programme.desc: The Playing Card Killer: Alfredo Galan. Desde la escuela, Alfredo Galán siempre quiso ser el centro de atención, al no lograrlo se une al ejército. Estando en las fuerzas de paz españolas en la cuidad de Mostar, estaba bajo órdenes estrictas de no responder a provocaciones. El aspirante a héroe se sintió inútil, le dijo a un amigo en privado que él quería saber cómo se sentía matar. De regreso a España, fue enviado para ayudar a la limpieza de un derrame petrolero y sintió que era una tarea que no estaba a su altura. Cuando una simple discusión con un trabajador civil se tornó violento, tuvo que abandonar el ejército por motivos médicos. Luego pasó semanas esperando decidir a quien matar...al azar. Su primera víctima fue un portero, el segundo un hombre que esperaba el autobús. Galán se convertiría en uno de los peores asesinos en serie de España con seis víctimas y dejando como identificador curioso, un naipe en los cuerpos de cada víctima(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson heads to Italy to get behind the wheel of the exclusive, hand-crafted Alfa Romeo Disco Volante, which is made by coachbuilder Touring Superleggera and based on the manufacturer's already rare 8C Competizione sports car. Richard Hammond asserts authority over the sand dunes of Abu Dhabi in the six-wheel-drive Mercedes-Benz G63 AMG 6x6, while James May defies his status as Captain Slow by blasting two Caterhams around the test track - the minimalist entry-level Seven 160 and the full-fat supercharged Seven 620R. Comedian Jack Whitehall sets a lap time in the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The presenters try to make an ordinary second-hand car lap the test track as fast as a new, purpose-built sports saloon. programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The three motoring enthusiasts head to Spain on a mission to help its struggling economy - but the convertible supercars they take are very expensive and anything but discreet. With Jeremy Clarkson in a McLaren MP4-12C, Richard Hammond driving a Ferrari 458 and James May behind the wheel of an Audi R8 V10, the trio encounter mountain passes, empty towns and an abandoned airport before creating their own street circuit in a deserted Madrid development. Plus, Sherlock star Benedict Cumberbatch sets a lap time in the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Sin City Motors

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson puts the Kia Cee'd through a rigorous but peculiar road test featuring eels, curry, a rock legend, an American police officer and an unusual game of rugby involving James May. Richard Hammond gets behind the wheel of the Mastretta MXT, but worries about the repercussions of a comment he made in a previous episode about Mexico, the sports car's country of manufacture. Plus, three high-performance hatchbacks are driven with gusto around the test track, and Formula One driver Lewis Hamilton gets a second chance to smash the lap record.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The team learns more about vans by putting them through a series of rigorous tests, including transporting equipment for rock group the Who. programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson drives the Jaguar F-Type sports car on some of Britain's finest roads, while Richard Hammond jumps inside the Range Rover Sport and gives it a thorough workout off-road, on a track and in what he believes is its most natural habitat - the lanes of Cheshire. James May goes for a countryside adventure in the New Routemaster London bus brought into use in 2013, which is propelled by a turbodiesel generator and a powerful electric motor. Inspired by the machines they have tested, the trio then meet to celebrate Britain's motor industry with a grand finale in front of Buckingham Palace. Plus, former Formula One driver Mark Webber takes to the track for a lap in the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson puts the Kia Cee'd through a rigorous but peculiar road test featuring eels, curry, a rock legend, an American police officer and an unusual game of rugby involving James May. Richard Hammond gets behind the wheel of the Mastretta MXT, but worries about the repercussions of a comment he made in a previous episode about Mexico, the sports car's country of manufacture. Plus, three high-performance hatchbacks are driven with gusto around the test track, and Formula One driver Lewis Hamilton gets a second chance to smash the lap record.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The team learns more about vans by putting them through a series of rigorous tests, including transporting equipment for rock group the Who. Ray Winstone is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car, British racing driver Jenson Button takes on the F1 Challenge and Richard Hammond test-drives the prototype Noble M15 supercar.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson drives the Jaguar F-Type sports car on some of Britain's finest roads, while Richard Hammond jumps inside the Range Rover Sport and gives it a thorough workout off-road, on a track and in what he believes is its most natural habitat - the lanes of Cheshire. James May goes for a countryside adventure in the New Routemaster London bus brought into use in 2013, which is propelled by a turbodiesel generator and a powerful electric motor. Inspired by the machines they have tested, the trio then meet to celebrate Britain's motor industry with a grand finale in front of Buckingham Palace. Plus, former Formula One driver Mark Webber takes to the track for a lap in the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Sin City Motors
programme.desc: Master fabricator Steve Darnell salvages a 1949 Ford F1 from a field. Elsewhere, tensions are high when Barber and Steve clash, and Dave makes several unfortunate errors.(n)

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: The wrestler challenges eight contestants to triumph over a series of gruelling physical endurance tests.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The trio of motoring enthusiasts embark on another epic road trip, this time across western America in front-engined supercars. Jeremy Clarkson pilots the Lexus LFA, which has a spectacularly high-revving V10 powerplant, Richard Hammond gets behind the wheel of the muscular Dodge Viper, and James May opts for the latest incarnation of Aston Martin's Vanquish. On their journey from Las Vegas to Palm Springs via Los Angeles, the presenters tackle racing circuits and find themselves in a race against the police, before rushing to the Mexican border - and there's a terrifying penalty for the last man to arrive. Meanwhile, Fleetwood Mac drummer Mick Fleetwood rolls up his sleeves to thrash the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear

James May puts the Bentley Continental GT Speed through its paces by taking it on a rally stage, while Richard Hammond drives the new Pagani Huayra hypercar before handing it over to the Stig. Actor Damian Lewis goes for a spin in the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear

James May is in Nevada to test the toughness of the Range Rover Evoque, driving it through Death Valley before chauffeuring a megastar across Las Vegas. Plus, the McLaren MP4-12C is compared with its supercar rival the Ferrari 458 Italia, and four-time Formula One world champion Sebastian Vettel is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake is assigned to a minor graffiti case by Captain Holt as punishment for turning up late for work, but the investigation becomes a major headache when the vandal's identity is revealed. Meanwhile, Gina's psychic friend Carlene visits the precinct to help with a case, and upsets Charles with a prediction about his romantic life. American comedy, starring Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel finds out that Joe's ex-wife, Tiffany, has been keeping a big secret from him after the former lovers rekindle a romantic spark. Elsewhere, Lennox works on winning a popularity contest at school. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel's personal trainer immediately hits it off with Joe, while Lennox struggles with a crush of her own when she tries to stay just friends with Beckett. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Ben and Tucker are keen to throw Bonnie out of the building when she sets up her new apartment across the hall from the boys, and decide to throw a huge, noisy party to annoy her. Meanwhile, Danny asks Riley for advice on how to split with Milena, but winds up in a compromising position. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau and Melissa Peterman.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Against Bonnie's advice, Ben persuades Danny to sign a sponsorship deal with a company that makes a brand of energy drink - but things go wrong at a photoshoot. Meanwhile, Riley takes an interest in volunteering and accepts a job helping out at the hospital. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney seduces Marshall's professor in the hope of improving his friend's grades, but finds his bedroom performance being graded instead. Lily takes a job at Ted's office, where she teaches his bullying boss Mr Druthers a lesson that lands her new colleagues in trouble. Guest starring Bryan Cranston (Breaking Bad) and Jane Seymour (Dr Quinn: Medicine Woman), with Alyson Hannigan and Neil Patrick Harris.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Lily becomes jealous of Marshall and Chloe's relationship and starts stalking the couple, while Ted and Barney try to convince Marshall that his new girlfriend is not sane and that he would be better off without her. Guest starring Morena Baccarin (Homeland).(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica is accepted into a summer arts school, but Murray struggles to express his pride in his daughter. Barry takes up the role of school sports mascot, but fails to realise that students from a rival school are planning to beat up the mascot at an upcoming game.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Lainey, Erica and Barry plan a big Risky Business-inspired party at Lainey's house while her father is out of town. However, when the gathering gets out of control, Beverly has to come to their rescue. Elsewhere, Adam annoys Murray by talking to Dana on the phone for hours on end.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Leonard invent excuses to avoid having to attend Penny's performance in a production of the stage musical Rent, but maintaining the pretence makes matters increasingly complicated. Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco star, with DJ Qualls.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon falls ill, and his friends decide to go to a Planet of the Apes movie marathon to keep their distance, knowing he will be in a terrible mood. However, an unsuspecting Penny offers to nurse him. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall's car breaks down for good just before reaching 200,000 miles, prompting the gang members to recall the adventures they had in it over the years. Lily and Robin reveal why there are two chopsticks in the glove box instead of cigars, and Ted tells the story of how he tried to teach Barney to drive. Comedy, starring Neil Patrick Harris and Cobie Smulders.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted prepares to move in with Robin - until Barney resorts to drastic measures to scupper their plans. Meanwhile, Marshall and Lily excitedly look forward to having the apartment to themselves, until they start to realise how dependent they have become on Ted. Guest starring Rachelle Lefevre (Twilight).(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta is put in charge of Captain Holt's security after he receives several death threats - a responsibility he not only enjoys, but also abuses as much as he can. Santiago tries to encourage her colleagues to take a Christmas photo, only to be met with a lack of enthusiasm - and Diaz's refusal to smile. US cop comedy, starring Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta tries to make a deal with a suspect Diaz has just arrested in an attempt to catch a car thief he has been tracking for years. Boyle's colleagues set out to meet his every need when he returns to work after being shot in the line of duty, and Captain Holt struggles to find a home for two puppies.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly is disappointed with her unenthusiastic family during the holidays, so she creates `Super Hanukkah' to get them into the spirit, and Adam offers Barry a dare.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam and Barry team up to form a rap super-group just like the Beastie Boys. Beverly puts pressure on Murray to let her redesign the kitchen, but when he refuses to allow it she comes up with a devious plan.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny becomes addicted to an online game based on the world of Conan the Barbarian. As her obsession intensifies, she begins to neglect her friends and seeks the company of the usually snide Sheldon, whom she continually pesters for advice. Starring Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Elated at being named one of People magazine's `30 to Watch Under 30', Raj makes a pass at Penny and becomes very arrogant, making it hard for Leonard to maintain a positive perspective on his friend's new-found confidence. Guest starring Charlie Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Grace confides in Frankie and Jack that she's worried about Esther, and Tegan tries to win over Liam, but his eye wanders to Courtney. Elsewhere, Maxine can not help but think that Adam has made up his mind about who he wants to be with.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Lainey tries to set her father up with a `woman of interest' by using new video dating technology. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang's annual trip to Comic-Con is thrown into doubt when Raj, who is no longer accepting his father's financial support, cannot afford to go.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends offer a place for Raj to live, only for it to create unexpected conflict among everyone and an argument between Amy and Leonard's mother.(n)

programme.title: Gap Year
programme.desc: The gang sign up to be extras in a Malaysian zombie film, with Greg fulfilling his childhood dream of being a policeman. The love triangle reaches an explosive climax.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers
programme.desc: Visitors to the studio include bride-to-be Hayley, whose cheeky cartoon tattoo is threatening to derail her wedding plans, while Sketch helps reformed bad boy Mick to cover up an X-rated inking that's causing embarrassment to his daughter. Alice assists best friends Tommy and Wally, who tattooed each other while drunk on holiday, and Jay deals with Steve's embarrassing collection of stick men on his leg.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon stumbles upon a major scientific breakthrough, causing him to feel like a fraud, while Penny steps up her game with Leonard after seeing Howard make a romantic gesture to Bernadette. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is hurt when Professor Proton (Bob Newhart) contacts Leonard for help, so he befriends TV scientist Bill Nye, and Raj gets jealous when Howard crashes a girls' night in making home-made jewellery. Starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki, and Kunal Nayyar.(n)

programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Wonder of Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham uses cutting-edge science to investigate complex communication methods that help dolphins to hunt.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: The effect of earthquakes on the earth's gravitational field, looking at the results of mapping by Nasa satellites which have found spots where the gravity is weaker.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: A look at how Earth's position in the solar system enables it to sustain life, while comparisons with Venus and Mars show how things might have been different.(n)

programme.title: How Earth Made Us
programme.desc: Iain Stewart reveals the effect that the Earth's winds have had on the development of civilisation. He visits the Saharan town of Chinguetti, once a vibrant transport hub, to learn how its success was due to global wind patterns, and explains how Christopher Columbus first made his name by mapping the trade winds off the coast of West Africa. Iain also shows how the rise of early Chinese civilisation was based on riches provided by the wind, but discovers a very different story at Australia's Mount Connor.(n)

programme.title: Life in the Undergrowth
programme.desc: An exploration of how invertebrates' production of silk 300 million years ago became their greatest invention. Stronger than a steel thread of the same diameter, the material is as pliable as elastic and employed by spiders for activities as diverse as courtship, catching prey and tending their young. David Attenborough reveals how some communal spiders create silken palaces rising 15m to 20m into the forest canopy.(n)

programme.title: The Wonder of Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham uses cutting-edge science to investigate complex communication methods that help dolphins to hunt.(n)

programme.title: So You Think You'd Survive
programme.desc: Circumstances including avalanches, jellyfish stings, intense desert heat, white-water rapids, dangerously thin ice, and lightning on a golf course are considered.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: The effect of earthquakes on the earth's gravitational field, looking at the results of mapping by Nasa satellites which have found spots where the gravity is weaker.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: A look at how Earth's position in the solar system enables it to sustain life, while comparisons with Venus and Mars show how things might have been different.(n)

programme.title: Life in the Undergrowth
programme.desc: An exploration of how invertebrates' production of silk 300 million years ago became their greatest invention. Stronger than a steel thread of the same diameter, the material is as pliable as elastic and employed by spiders for activities as diverse as courtship, catching prey and tending their young. David Attenborough reveals how some communal spiders create silken palaces rising 15m to 20m into the forest canopy.(n)

programme.title: Operation Wild
programme.desc: Clare Balding travels to Japan where she visits inventor and vet Dr Keiichi Ueda. The vet has dedicated the past 12 years of his career to helping a dolphin called Fuji who has no tail as a result of a bacterial infection and he is hoping that a new prosthetic tail will enable her to swim properly again. Steve Leonard heads to the rainforest of Laos, where Edinburgh Zoo vet Romain Pizzi is undertaking keyhole surgery on a endangered moon bear called Champa who suffers from excess fluid on her brain. Steve then visits Florida where reptile specialist Doug Mader is using the latest technology to save Martha, an alligator with a badly blocked gut. Clare and Steve also follow the stories of a Galapagos tortoise with a mystery illness, a five-ton elephant suffering from an infected tusk and a tiger that keeps having nose bleeds.(n)

programme.title: The Wonder of Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham uses cutting-edge science to investigate complex communication methods that help dolphins to hunt.(n)

programme.title: So You Think You'd Survive
programme.desc: Circumstances including avalanches, jellyfish stings, intense desert heat, white-water rapids, dangerously thin ice, and lightning on a golf course are considered.(n)

programme.title: How Earth Made Us
programme.desc: Iain Stewart reveals the effect that the Earth's winds have had on the development of civilisation. He visits the Saharan town of Chinguetti, once a vibrant transport hub, to learn how its success was due to global wind patterns, and explains how Christopher Columbus first made his name by mapping the trade winds off the coast of West Africa. Iain also shows how the rise of early Chinese civilisation was based on riches provided by the wind, but discovers a very different story at Australia's Mount Connor.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: The science behind blizzards, which might be considered beautiful yet can bring entire cities to a grinding halt.(n)

programme.title: How Earth Made Us
programme.desc: Iain Stewart explores humanity's double-edged relationship with fire, which has simultaneously proven to be a crucial source of energy and a force for destruction. Along the way he takes a therapeutic bath in crude oil, and learns how fire played a vital role in the Industrial Revolution in Britain but held back China's development.(n)

programme.title: Life in the Undergrowth
programme.desc: David Attenborough turns his attention to the network of partnerships that invertebrates have developed with one another and with plants. He reveals how the fairy wasp, the world's smallest insect, flies underwater to inject its eggs into those of the water beetle. Footage also shows how the caterpillar of the blue butterfly smuggles its way into an ants' nest by mimicking the smell of their young.(n)

programme.desc: Jennifer Jason Leigh and Alan Cumming co-wrote, co-directed and costar in this well-acted, all-star comedy-drama about a show-business couple's sixth-anniversary bash---a daylong affair of sex, drugs, professional rivalries and personal grudges. programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Sequel to the 1976 Oscar-winning favourite which catapulted Sylvester Stallone to megastardom. Things are looking grim for Philadelphia boxer Rocky Balboa. His wife is in a post-natal coma and he has an eye injury that could cost him his sight. But heavyweight champion Apollo Creed's pride is still smarting from their first bout, and he wants a rematch with the Italian Stallion(n)

programme.title: Out to Sea
programme.desc: A gambling addict persuades his brother-in-law to go on a cruise to snare wealthy women and con them out of a few bucks...but fails to tell him that the two will be waltzing their way across deck as the cruise dance instructors. Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, Dyan Cannon, Gloria De Haven, Brent Spiner, Elaine Stritch, Hal Linden, Donald O'Connor, Edward Mulhare, Rue McClanahan(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: The Storm. Desperate to further her son's claim to the throne, Margaret Beaufort joins Warwick's rebellion against Edward. The rebellion fails and the traitors must run for their lives. Jasper Tudor escapes into exile, while Warwick and George sail for France. Elizabeth and Jacquetta turn to witchcraft to stop them, but it is Isabel who is punished(n)

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: An interracial couple moves into their California dream home, only to find themselves the target of their volatile next-door neighbor -- a racist LAPD officer -- in this tightly wound thriller starring Samuel L. Jackson and Kerry Washington. Newlyweds Chris and Lisa seem like they have the perfect marriage and now, with their new home in the exclusive community Lakeview Terrace, the perfect life as well, but things soon turn ugly in the posh neighborhood when they begin to receive threats from their neighbor Abel, a middle-aged LAPD officer who has obvious objections to the couple's interracial marriage. What starts as an attitude problem soon morphs into full-on harassment, and before long the couple finds that their worries go far beyond their property values -- or the encroaching California wildfire burning in view of their community -- as they begin to fear for their lives(n)

programme.title: Jaws

programme.title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
programme.desc: Stella is a highly successful, forty-something San Francisco stock broker who is persuaded by her colorful New York girlfriend Delilah to take a well deserved, first-class vacation to Jamaica. As she soaks in the beauty of the island, she encounters a strapping, young islander, Winston Shakespeare. His pursuits for her turn into a hot and steamy romance that forces Stella to take personal inventory of her life and try to find a balance between her desire for love and companionship, and the responsibilities of mother and corporate executive(n)

programme.title: Fired Up!
programme.desc: This peppy and uproarious teen romp is boosted by excellent performances from Nicholas D'Agosto and Eric Christian Olsen as Illinois high-school football stars who bag summer camp in red-hot Texas to try their luck at cheerleading camp instead. With 300 young ladies to hit on, it becomes more of a booty camp than boot camp for the two young lotharios. But before they know it, both get more involved, romantically and athletically, than they expected. Molly Sims. Directed by Will Gluck(n)

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Hancock is a sarcastic, hard-living and misunderstood superhero who has fallen out of favor with the public. Edith Bowman presents a behind-the-scenes look at one of the most eagerly anticipated British films in years. programme.title: In Too Deep
programme.desc: How far can an undercover cop go into the ruthless underworld of an urban drug cartel, filled with violence, power, and money, before he can no longer find his way out? Omar Epps stars as Detective Jeffrey Cole, a recent graduate from the police academy, who believes he was born to serve as an undercover agent. His big break comes in the shape of a crimelord known as 'GOD' who's connected with 80% of the city's crime. After Cole stays 'under' for too long, his superiors begin to see him as a threat to their operation. Once his mission is finished, will he be able to separate himself from the character he created , or will he lose himself in the same evil he hopes to destroy?(n)
